original_text: While the man held on to Peter and John, all the people were astonished and came running to them in the place called Solomon’s Colonnade.
korean_text: 나은 사람이 베드로와 요한을 붙잡으니 모든 백성이 크게 놀라며 달려 나아가 솔로몬의 행각이라 불리우는 행각에 모이거늘

sentences.original_text: While the man held on to Peter and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 베드로와 요한을 붙잡고 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: in the place called Solomon's Colonnade
